name: Fae's Fate
description:
(Congratulations! You are the lucky winner of a gorgeous riverside property on the Isle of Silus. Your new land is equipped with a cozy cottage ready for your personal touch and plenty of land ready for you to use. 

Once you are settled in, explore the town and meet all your new neighbors, all of who are eager to see who the winner of this prize is. Visit the beach or the local hot spring to unwind. Take up a pickaxe and blow off some steam in the mines while earning some extra money. 

Don't forget to check out the local museum/library to learn about the history and myths of our Isle. Silus is the perfect place to move your family to, or if it's just you, possibly the place where you meet the love of your life. )

This game is a farming simulation game that gets its inspiration from early Harvest Moon games and the recent Story of Seasons games. The game currently is an empty explorable world still being crafted, however, I want this to be a transparent project/development process where I can take criticisms and opinions and implement them when seen fit.
